i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Jerk van almost merged into me

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Extremely bright light from oncoming cyclists blinded me. I nearly missed a collision with a pedestrian that I couldn't see because of the oncoming cyclist's light.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The car infront of me was turning right, I did not have time to stop so I swerved to the left to avoid the car and ended up hitting the back of the car.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A cyclist (without helmet) passed me.  He cut me off as he headed for the sidewalk.  I was in the designated bike lane.  He didn't make it and went down right in front of me.  With only about 2 feet max. between me and his bike, I had nowhere to go and went down right on top of his bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going straight through an intersection, person in oncoming traffic turning left started turning and I had to stop rapidly to avoid collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was going stright in the bike lane and a car passed me just to turn right in front of me. I had to swerve so as not to drive into the side of her car. Motorists are not paying attention to the fact that bikes can go straight in that bike lane. There needs to be signage.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A truck "rolled coal" on me, speeding up to get ahead of me while I was in the bike lane, then the driver veered hard right to obstruct the bike lane and braked hard in front of me. I was raised my forearm to block and was struck in the forearm by the passenger side mirror.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: me and car both waiting for a green, light goes green, he turns right with no blinker as I go straight.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cycling club  outing. Passing slower cyclist, wheels touched and bike flipped over.  I landed at a sharp angle and high speed on right shoulder and right side of helmet. Seizure in ambulance and in coma by ER . Broke clavicle, scapula, 5 ribs. In hospital for 8 days. Off work for 3 months.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Hit by right hand turning car at lights while proceeding straight through intersection

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding bike straight and a car turned between stopped vehicular traffic and cut across wide shoulder into driveway.

i_type: Fall
details: painted line diving direction lanes was extremely slippery because of wet conditons

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in bike lane and an idiot turning left almost smushed me.

i_type: Fall
details: As I approached an intersection at Tillicum a car turned his wheels into the curb blocking my path.  This same car had just sped past me on the right despite the fact that I was riding the speed limit of 30 km/h on a quiet residential street.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding home from school east along Old Cleveland Rd. Car pulled out of side street - Burke Street - in front of me to make a break in the traffic. I collided with the car towards the back. First thing driver said was he did not see me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle heading south, turning onto quieter section of Henderson at junction with Foul Bay, ignored my oncoming presence and continued to glide through the "turn" lane to continue south on Henderson.  Came within a few feet of the vehicle.  The vehicle did not speed up or slow down, just kept coming

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cycling approximately 1m from curb past a 'cyclists may use full lane sign' a driver drove close enough to brush my jacket with his mirror.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Crossed through the MacKenzie intersection onto the Goose when a car honked behind me.  As I turned to look, I ran into the post that prevents cars from driving on the Goose.  I was picked up by a passing vehicule that brought me to the Emergency.  15 stitches and a month of hobbling.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was heading straight through the green light at McKenzie and Borden Street in the bike lane.  An SUV without his right turn signal on, and without looking started to turn right when I was right beside it.  I yelled loudly and the truck stopped before hitting me.

i_type: Fall
details: It was a rainy evening after a dry spell, so the roads were wet and oily. I suffered a concussion and some memory loss so I can't say for sure, but I believe I was turning right onto Quadra from Chatterton when my front wheel slipped out to the left suddenly. No other vehicles were involved.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Road veers left where bicycle lane ends and road start uphill.  Truck with a trailer was going fast and  cut me off and I ended up in the ditch

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I signaled I was going to turn left in advance of the turn.  An impatient cyclist screamed  'just turn' but  that was not possible yet.  He then screamed  to say he was passing on the right. As I passed through 3ft dividers/poles which narrow the trail he tried to pass me and we both fell hard.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Car passed me on Begbie and turned right towards Fern st, stopped in front of me when she remembered that there was a cyclist there and i hit her car and fell on my side.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Partial blind corner, cars moving over speed limit, difficult to cross this intersection with cars speeding up cad bay road! No appropriate warning of crossing for oncoming cars.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bad 4way stop where vehicles frequently do not stop fully and often ignore cyclists. Several incidents this past year. Bad potholes/ruts in intersection. Lots of kids use the inter section en route to willows.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
A driver decided to go through a one way only (for cyclist and cars). Almost hit another cyclist.

No one was injured.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: the car ran the stop sign and hit my front wheel turning it into a pretzel.  i was thrown off my bike but was not touched by the car.  It hit me just in front of my leg.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I had right of way. Car attempted to cross 22nd  to continue on Lillooete in front of me. I t-boned the car.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turned right while I was headed straight. I was knocked off of my bike. Driver received a ticket from attending police officer.

i_type: Fall
details: Street car tracks close to side of street because streetcars turn onto Queen Street from Broadview

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Poorly marked 3-way stop at a 4-way intersection.  Vehicles coming from the main road into the lot have right of way and moving quite fast.  This is not clearly indicated.  I waiting for my turn, assuming it was a 4 way stop, and was hit by a vehicle that had the right of way.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I waited on the south east corner of  the light across Pacific until it changed. As I rode across in the crosswalk, a pickup truck turned left from Abbott onto Pacific and hit the rear tire of my bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Person tried to turn right as I was biking straight. They did not have their turn signal on. There is no right-hand turn lane there. I was wary, and noticed him beginning to steer toward me and yelled, catching his attention and swerving while slowing on my bike to avoid a collision.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading down Schuykill River Trail (SRT). 3 cyclists sprinted to beat traffic light, crossed Kelly Drive, merged onto SRT without looking or yielding. At that moment we collided. I destroyed my bike and shattered my clavicle.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver pulled into the bike lane because she was tired of sitting in traffic. I yelled at her and she moved back into the vehicle lane. Very near miss.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: The car stopped and passenger door opened in my path.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turning right from Shelboune Plaza parking lot was stopped at the stop sign.  Decided to turn when I was directly infront of him.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The bike/ped path over the Ironworker's Bridge, heading North has a crosswalk at the Main St onramp.  Several cars refused to stop for me, despite activating the flashing yellow and moving out on the crosswalk to indicate that I would like to cross. This is actually a frequent occurrence here.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: the through-lane turns right and for a cyclist going north cars often cut off the cyclist. I always signal forward by putting my hand out straight in front of me and making eye contact that I intend to go straight. That generally works but sometimes a car will speed ahead and cut in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver cut into the bike lane without looking, attempting pass left turning vehicle in front of them.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car passed, served into parking lane, braked hard in front of me.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A woman driving a car decided she no longer wanted to turn right; she reversed in order to clear a concrete barrier so that she could turn left. I was behind her. I tried to get out of her way but she backed into me.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was past the intersection heading East, crossing the merge lane for vehicles turning onto Westminster Hwy heading East. A car comes up frm behind and passes me on the right, way to close for comfort. Seemingly wth no regard for human life, he continued to drive away.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Black pick up truck heading north crossed the centre line towards me in what appeared to be a deliberate attempt to intimidate.

I called the local RCMP to report the incident, but since call was more than 20 minutes after incident, no car sent out as not possible to intercept alleged perp.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle changed lanes into the far right lane where I was riding and the vehicle was parallel to me.  The vehicle did not stay centered in the lane and continued to drift right forcing me into the gutter.  I kicked the passenger door with my left foot which alerted the driver.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: vehicle pulled out into road in front of me. Forcing me to brake hard and use opposite carriageway to avoid collision.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was on Willingdon, turning left onto Beresford in the left turn lane.   Cars heading North on Willingdon were stopped due to red light at Central Blvd.  A car heading west on Beresford failed to stop at the stop sign, proceeding into the intersection and almost hit me.  They stopped just short.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Motorcycle speed through a roundabout nearly running me over had I not stopped in time.

i_type: Fall
details: Collision with obscured raised median.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle drove straight through stop sign.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going straight on a green light. Truck signaled to turn right over the bike lane but I was coming too fast to stop. Cut right toward the curb to avoid impact. Back end of the truck bumped my rear left bag as the driver saw me and stopped. Driver got out to make sure I was okay.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Have to merge from right bike lane to left in order to turn left onto Foul Bay road. All while trying to dodge vehicles racing ahead to turn into Save On parking lot. Brutal intersection.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This collision resulted in my friend's death. I report just what I have learned from reports on behalf of all cyclists. What actually happened, did he stray off the paved shoulder, did something distract him, did something go wrong with the bike did the driver of the truck come too close is unknown.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turned right in front of my into the Camosun parking lot, forcing me to slam my brakes on.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding in front of my wife, along Shelbourne Rd. There was heavy traffic, this one car can so close the passages side mirror folded when it hit my leg. I stayed up do to good bike handling skills. the car continued on.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car pulling out of a parking lot didn't see me as I rode in the bike lane and almost hit me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Trio cement truck at the stop sign, ignored the bicycles only sign and went into the opposing lane to pass around the diverter island.  

Vehicles frequently make this illegal movement which is risky for all road users at this intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle driver was impatient and did not wait for the approaching vehicle to pass and therefore "squeezed" by me. The right hand mirror was less than 6 inches away from my arm.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver failed to make a full stop turning right from Alston to Skinner. Nearly hit me. I had to bang on the driver side window as she cut me off to get her attention.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car started pulling out from parallel parking without checking mirror.  I yelled and he noticed and stopped and I was able to avoid the corner of his vehicle.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver was in stopped traffic. I was passing to the right of cars, in a painted bike lane. This driver made a sudden decision to turn right into an alley to escape the traffic, but did not signal or check her mirrors. She lurched out as I was approaching the laneway she was entering and we connected

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in the bike lane headed straight. Taxi next to me turning right. Taxi cut me off as I was going straight and it turned right. I hit the front passenger side door.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was waiting at the light. standing in the middle of the lane on the light change road marking. A van pulled around me as the light turned green. I was going straight and the Van attempted to make a right hand turn around me. It struck my front wheal.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading west on Estevan Avenue between Musgrave and Foul Bay road.    This road has lots of parked cars on either side of street.     As I was in the centre of the street going around a parked car,  a motorist approached from behind, and attempted to overtake and pass me - with no space.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
A eastbound vehicle turning left onto Clark drive northbound from Adenac street. 
The sun was just rising over the horizon and the driver did not see the cyclist and narrowly missed by inches after cyclist took evasive action.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: roadway was narrow, other riders on the road were not paying attention to approaching traffic when one of them pulled out directly in front of me, I swerved, fell, broke my pelvis, knocked out as well.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: One car stopped in WB bike lane behind De Dutch. Another car pulled out of parking spot behind De Dutch into bike lane, without ability to see cyclists in bike lane. I moved into car lane, when the stopped car suddenly reversed from the bike lane into the car lane almost hitting me.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: I was turning from a slow street to a busy street and a person waiting at the crosswalk was obscured from my view by a telephone pole. i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: driver accelerated at the merger and swerved head on into my lane while trying to pass a car even though i was already beside the parked vehicle.  narrow street, ignorant driver, very hazardous.  have had other similar incidents at this weird merger.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: poor signage, buses and cars coming downhill often pose hazard at this silly merger/intersection.  poor design, very hazardous.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cyclist stationary at red light in right hand side of lane (wheel well rut in road). Vehicle approached with wheel approx 1ft distance from cyclist's foot. Driver saw cyclist, made aggressive gesture in response to cyclist's wave. Driver proceeded to accelerate aggressively through intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The bike lane becomes a right turn lane here.   I was moving towards the intersection when a car, also westbound, in the straight through lane slowed and cut in front of me to the northbound lane on No3 road.  No indicator light was used.  The car behind honked and almost rear-ended the perpetrator.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car nearly sideswiped me with a close pass so he could get to a red light faster.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: heading south on Eleanor road.  Cut off by car  ( black, late model 4 door ? ) which sped by us and turned right on Anderton rd. First I saw of the car was when I ran into it's side.  Car left scene without stopping.  Several witnesses saw it unfold, but no one got the license #.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Followed Google Maps directions from Park Royal to Capilano Rd via Marine Dr. The route directed me into middle of busy (5 lane?) highway with cars moving very fast on both sides, could not safely move right into bike lane. Confronted by angry driver who got out of vehicle at Capilano Rd.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car came up on my right side about a foot away. He proceeded to move closer until I was forced off the road causing me to lose control and land on the side of the road. Bike was fine, a few scrapes for me. Man came to ask if I was OK. Biked to UVIC shortly afterwards.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A large pickup truck buzzed within inches of me while passing on my right.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Repeat encounter with aggressive driver.  She came up beside me and swerved her car towards me as she passed.  I have been verbally threatened by this driver in the past and recognized the car and license plate.  I will be reporting this one to the police.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: After light had changed to green I proceeded through  intersection and had to lock up brakes as SUV went through red light and then pointed to the sunset as the sun had apparently obscured their view of the traffic signal.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Fall
details: About 6 bikes all travelling at different speeds.   Was being overtaken while travelling ~25km/h while on the right side of the path and about to overtake a slower biker.  Hit both brakes to avoid a collision and flew over the handlebars onto the pavement.  Injury:Minor cracked radial head fracture.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Almost every time I cycle past here (on the goose) I have some sort of near miss with the vehicles in the lane merging on the highway.  No one seems to look for bikers/pedestrians here.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A vehicle was heading east on Haultain St between Cook St and Fernwood Rd. The vehicle passed me just before Cedar Hill Rd and almost t-boned a vehicle travelling south on Cedar Hill as it crossed the intersection. Visibility around Cedar Hill and Haultain isn't that great.  Caution for cyclists.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: s bend in trail with obstructed view and over grown contested trail

This has the effect of creating a cornered acceleration lane.   Cars start to gain speed before attempting to stop for pedestrians - unsafe.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turned right in fron if me without looking, coming very  Close to hitting me

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I stopped at a 4-way stop sign and the car travelling south ran the stop sign and almost hit me. I put on my breaks quickly and avoided a collision. The car kept going and didn't stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car seemed hesitant to yield to cyclist in  round-about who was hand signalling an exit.. eye contact was made with driver who did stop. After, the vehicle passed extremely close to cyclist and swerving to the right, nearly colliding.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver failed to yield to cyclist, cyclist failed to stop and check before turning; cyclist hit turning left.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

details: GF and I riding down quiet street, no space for bikes and cars. Woman honks, then passes us very closely.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

details: A Semi-Truck cut the corner on the hwy, where I was riding, and continued to merge into the "bike lane" without an advanced signal.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: White truck stopped at stop sign and then proceeded to turn into intersection which was occupied by the cyclist who was signaling a left turn at the time, forcing the cyclist to lock up brakes and nearly collide with the side of the truck

details: A car brushed me while it passed me on the left and cut in front of me to take the street exiting to the south.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

Cycling across the crosswalk a vehicle failed to yield until I called out. I braked abruptly and the vehicle (the driver heard me call), gave a startled cry and stopped in front of me. 

This is the second time this has happened to me at this crosswalk in the past few months.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Painted bike lane is on the far left side of the three-car lane street. The car was making a left turn and didn't check for bicycles on RED painted bicycle lane.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading uphill, out from parked car, vehicle pulls directly behind and passes me within foot.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car approached me quickly from the rear, passed me very closely and forced me to dodge right.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The car cut me off.  We both were turning right.  The car should be forced to make a wider turn with a physical separation.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was riding NW along Norfolk when semi-truck rig (no trailer on) came up from behind me. It did not move over to pass me and my handle was grabbed by truck. I was dragged 20 metres before my bike dislodged and was thrown off my bike into road. Truck did not stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Attempted Left Cross from Cornhusker onto North US 75 ramp.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car parallel parking failed to see cyclist coming behind.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I witnessed the aftermath of a collision between 2 male cyclists on the off ramp of Hwy 1 @ north end of the Iron Workers Memorial Bridge.  Emergency workers on the scene said that the 2 cyclists collided with each other were traveling in opposite directions & both cyclists were sent to hospital.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Shotly after passing a vehicle parked in the bike lane, a second vehicle turned into the bike lane. My front wheel use forced between right front tire and bumper.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Hit from behind while waiting for red light to change.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading through the intersection, passing other bike riders (including children). Was out in the middle of the lane, saw a car in my rear view mirror and had to dodge right quickly to avoid as he passed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding across the intersection slowly, a car coming from 119 st was turning left into 34 Ave. I had to stop.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car did not fully stop at a 2 way stop sign and t-boned cyclist in intersection. Cyclist did not have a stop sign.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Vehicles make a turning lane out of the roadway infront of the strip mall to turn right onto Edmonton Trail NE (southbound).
Motorist did not right shoulder check and turned into me to move around traffic waiting for the light to change.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in a bike lane and slowing as a I arrived at a light that just turned green. I then kept going but the car in the lane to my right started turning towards the fountain tire and hit me. I feel onto the road and bent my handlebars and broke my kneecap.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The light was green and I was in the bike lane and was about to cross when a truck started to turn right into the parking lot and cut me off. If I hadn't seen him as soon as I did he would have hit me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver of a small car failed to yield right of way to me while I was in the traffic circle. Driver was surprised to see me almost in their driver window.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Roadway is narrow in sections.  Truck passed and proceeded to move back fully into the lane without having completed the pass.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: A deer was eating in the bushes right at the end of the path and was not visible until I came around the curve. Both of us were scared!

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Coming down a downhill, I had a dbag on a cell phone getting out of a car by swinging his door open suddenly, right in front of me. I swerved to dodge it. The bike land doesn't provide much protection from car doors opening to close line you.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turned left across cycle track then immediately braked.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A vehicle in the southbound lane pulled out into the right turn lane as I was signalling and taking the lane. They misjudged my speed and I had to brake hard. Southbound drivers often race cyclists to cut ahead at the right turn lane.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver was heading eastbound on Point Grey Rd toward Alma, and turned left across bike lane.  I had to hit brakes hard to avoid running into the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Where Bowness road goes under the train bridge, there is no shoulder.  While riding under that bridge, a city bus passed me from behind.  Due to the constrained space under the train bridge, the bus passed so close to me that I nearly lost control of my bike with a bus right beside me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bus entered bike land as I was in it to pull into their bus stop, nearly side swiping me. Made eye contact with driver before do he knew of my presence a few blocks before incident.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was turning left in an intersection. I had to wait for head on traffic to clear before I turned and when it was my turn to go a driver that was in a right hand turn lane (opposite of me) gunned out of his lane and ran straight into me. He couldn't see me that great because the sun was setting in W

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Motorist made illegal right hand turn from the curb lane of Wharf on the south side of Johnson.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Car passed my bike, then came to a stop at the end of the cul de sec, blocking the bike path that flows through it. Passenger opened door into me as I slowly passed

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was nearly hit by a car that was speeding and swerved about five feet as they got close to me.   Missed me by less than a foot. If I had not pulled over to the edge I would have been hit.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Like the other marker on this map, I was heading straight along the old highway toward a green light at the bottom of Ryan Road.  Two, yes two, vehicles cut me off to take the verge onto Ryan.  It's not the first time that's happened.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Speeding BMW turned onto W 5th (heading eastward) and crossed into my lane as I cycled west, nearing the intersection. He passed within half a meter.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Person driving the car did not stop and failed to check the bike lane when making a right hand turn off Rosehill Dr onto Cambrian Dr NW. I had to move from the bike lane over to the oncoming traffic lane to avoid being hit (there was no oncoming traffic and no traffic behind me.)

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A white van stopped alongside me at the light and attempted to pass me on the right when the light turned green. He failed to do so, changed over to the left side and passed < 1 ft on my left. He intentionally endangered my life while breaking the law.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Followed car turning left, it didn't see and continued to turn without signaling to make three-point turn. Had to break suddenly.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding up the hill, beside a row of parked cars. A driver was getting out of his car, and after he closed his door, he stepped out into the street without looking and stepped right into me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cars turning left east bound do not see cyclists coming west bound with right of way. Multiple occasions.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: There is a pedestrian crossing and the person waiting at the side of the road was shaded. The car in front of me stopped suddenly.  I wasn't prepared to stop so quickly and I rear ended them. I was thrown up onto their car and my teeth where smashed and my fingers numb.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: We were bicycling along the path and just as we went over a small wooden bridge another bicyclist came at high speeds around the corner and nearly collided with us head-on. It is a blind corner.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was stopped at the lights at the intersection and truck ran into me from behind and it flipped me over my handle bars into the middle of the street where I landed on my shoulder.  The truck the proceeded to drive off and through the red light leaving me in the middle of the road.  Hit and run

i_type: Fall
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: After crossing 29th at the pedestrian crossing to continue to the multi-use pathway down to Nanaimo St., a string of cars coming down the hill (northbound) proceeded through the green light at over 65km/h. The front driver did not see me and narrowly missed me on my left. Traffic calming needed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Near right hook crash at location where bike lane abruptly ends well short of the Clingman intersection with Hilliard.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going straight in a bike lane, car turned right without signalling and entered bike lane. Front-side of car hit my leg and snapped my pedal off. Bruised and banged up my foot but it easily could have been much worse.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Fall
details: Geese crowding path, had to hit front brakes hard to avoid them and fell off my bike.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: i was stopped wtih another bike in the bike lane, talking at the red light, and another bike came up between us and hit us. seemed bizarre- perhaps they thought they had clearance to get through as the light changed? But this was not true.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was headed east on 10th (bike route) through the cambie intersection, and a car headed north on cambie aimed to make a right turn on 10th without seeing me. i had to slam on breaks but there was no collision.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Crossing the intersection along the crosswalk towards a bike path at the corner. Vehicle makes a left from behind and nearly hits me. I have to swerve and brake sharply to avoid being hit.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turning right off JSB merged into me, forcing me to brake.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: i hit the rear end of a car that was turning left.  I had the right of way. The driver said he didn't see me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver in a black pickup truck nearly side swiped me, then starts cursing loudly about cyclists and threatened to "run you over" if he sees another cyclist on the street.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A tourist nearly cut me off when they suddenly swerved into an empty parking spot... no looking around at whether it was safe or not!

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: I had waited in the queue to enter the roundabout, then once in it, car driver behind me objected to me riding a bike in the roundabout. Sounded horn, did a barely missing threatining sideswipe attempt while yelling obscenities then speeding off.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was riding my bike home from work at Laurier and someone didn't fully stop at a stop sign. Wasn't until they saw they almost hit me that they made a full stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Approaching an intersection on a designated bike route. Traffic island preceded intersection for pedestrian crossing. Driver began overtake and was forced to pull in at the traffic island and pushed me into the curb. Was kind enough to honk at me for it to .

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: untrained dogs off leash jumped out of the tall grass right in front of me. Hit brakes hard and flew over handle bars. Could have killed the dogs had I run them over. The dogs were suppose to be on leash in that section of the park

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver pulling out of McDonalds. Had to swerve into traffic to avoid hitting the front of the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Stopped to politely ask driver parked illegally in bike lane to move as they were completely blocking the bike lane, forcing me to bike in the traffic/bus lane. Was aggressively berated by the passenger who also threw an empty water bottle at me out the open driver window.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I passed a truck waiting to enter West bound traffic from a driveway. After I passed the truck it squealed onto the road passed me, cut me off and I lost my balance and I fell to the curb side of the road. And then the driver sped off. No injuries, save near death palpitations!

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver tried to turn right and cut me off.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A postal worker made a very fast rolling stop while making a right turn and saw me just in time to brake.

i_type: Fall
details: Oil / Muck on road just at bend where farm vehicles turn into farm, very slick and went over while braking/turning.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was cycling EB on Cannon in cycle track. At Macnab the light was green and a GO bus was turning left (N) fr Cannon to Macnab. It failed to yield and simply turned left across the cycle track despite me going straight through. I braked fast and narrowly missed colliding w/ side of bus. Time:330pm

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: car speeding north on vernon; came faster then expected as i was pulling out from stop sign on adanac bike route headed east

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: While crossing the intersection heading south, a southbound pickup truck turning left across traffic floored the gas to get through the intersection in front of me, forcing me to slam on the breaks and nearly causing me to broadside the driver side of the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver of a blue sedan executed a U-Turn from the oncoming (Northbound) curb across both lanes of traffic and into the bike lane. I (cyclist) was forced to bake hard to avoid colliding with the front passenger corner of the vehicle. The driver proceeded on their way without any further interaction.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: car speeding uphill turned left almost into me

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: While crossing the intersection, on coming motorist failed to yield to multi-use pathway/sidewalk pedestrian crossing.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: While crossing the Canadian Tire parking lot exit, I was struck by a motorist that failed to stop & yield to the mutli-use pathway / sidewalk crossing. The motorist struck my rear quarter and I fell off my bike into oncoming traffic.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: A parked motorist opened the driver side door into the pained bike lane, causing me to veer and shout, very loudly. Apology not accepted!

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Light turned green and I went ahead. Driver tried to beat me to turn right on to service road across intersection. He turned right in front of me and I slammed into his rear side. He kept driving and didn't stop. My bike was ok.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: 18 wheeler passed so close it pushed me up onto the sidewalk - brushed against elbow.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was turning right onto the Switch Bridge, suddenly another cyclist appeared in front of me making left turn from the Switch Bridge, speeding up and using the wrong lane of trail - the one I was on. To avoid head on collision I made a sharp left  turn, fell off the bike and injured the leg.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Biked on crosswalk. Saw a truck coming, thought the truck was going to stop, but it did not.

Always stop at a cross walk and wait for cars to GIVE you right of way. Don't assume, because you might end up getting severely injured.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was stopped in the traffic queue waiting for signal and was rear-ended by a motorist. It was only a light bump and did not knock me over.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was turning proceeding straight across St. George. Vehicle on St. George was turning onto Benton, when driver did not see cyclist proceeding straight.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Southbound vehicle turning right cut in front of me, did not yield to oncoming traffic that had right-of-way.

I was wearing a reflective sash.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was in the bike lane where it transitions into a left turn lane when a car went around me much less than two feet from my handlebars. The car then slammed on the brakes and swerved into the right-turn lane and waited at a red light. Would it have killed them to wait 2-3 seconds? It nearly killed me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Punishment Pass. The driver who came within an inch of creaming me had plenty of room to pass by moving over into an opposite lane (like 4 other drivers just did). This driver intended to scare me. Fortunately, there is a light at Moscrop and Canada Way. I caught up and shared my thoughts.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading S on Gordon in bike lane when a minivan right hooked me as he turned into the dry cleaners.  Impacted centre right side of the van and somehow ended up under the right front wheel.  Concussion, road rash, wrecked bike, garmin, phone, gear.  Driver charged with careless.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A white straight truck passed me with one wheel in the bike lane, nearly clipping me from the side.  They continued driving north along the white line or slightly inside the bike lane.

i_type: Fall
details: Lost control of bike

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in the eastbound right lane when given the green at the on-off ramp intersection. The motorist almost merged into me as I approached the Hanover intersection.

i_type: Fall
Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Bike path poorly designed. 1,20 next to parked cars.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I attended an head on accident between two male cyclists.  It was a severe collision with both going to the hospital, and one requiring extensive surgery.  The grass alongside the trail was quite high and obstructed the view of the sharp turn.  This probably was the one of the main driving factors.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was crossing a crosswalk on my bike when a driver rolled through the stop light (light was red her direction) only checking traffic left. Driver accelerated and hit me as I was crossing.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: She had yielded to let a cyclist coming towards me go, and I advanced through the crossing when she accelerated into my side because she couldnt see me due to dirty windows and sun blindness.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle

details:

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I signalled my turn, and as I started my turn, the driver tried to pass me, and we collided

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding through the intersection of Milledge and Macon Highway, with a green light. The vehicle was turning left from Milledge onto Macon Highway and clipped my back wheel. I spun, was thrown from the bike and landed on the pavement. As far as I know, the car never stopped.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A cube van/small transport truck hit me with its driver's side wing mirror while it was turning right on to Fort St and I was waiting for the light to change to green. I was motionless on the bike mark.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

details: A toddler suddenly darted out in front of me from a side trail increased by bushes.  I managed to swerve to avoid him, but if I had been any closer I would not have been able to avoid a collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver stopped in the bicycle path instead of at the stop sign.  Almost took out two people on bicycles and proceeded to curse at the bicyclists.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in left lane of (1 way) Stanley Park Dr. Near the Totem Poles, a GMC pickup in the right lane saw a parking lot on the left, turned left in front of me. i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Classic car-dooring. Doing 30-35km/h, no time at all to react. Traffic on the road next to me as well. Can't remember exactly details apart from rolling on the road and being thankful I wasn't run over. Sore shoulder from hitting the door, sore right hip, grazes. Front wheel slightly buckled.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver wasn't paying attention and rolled into bike lane while rounding curve.

details:
Bike lane is angled on tracks makes it even more dangerous.
Loss of consciousness

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I had right of way on the roundabout and the vehicle failed to stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding west along McKenzie near Tuscany Village, driver of car pulled out in front of bike . Had to break hard to avoid collision.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle

i_type: Fall

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Attempting to cross the street at a marked pedestrian crossing when a vehicle ran a red light.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle

Beware!

details: Cars daily have near misses with pedestratians and bikes here

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Another cyclist went through stop sign and collided with me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was cycling in the bike lane along Shelbourne St./Cedar Hill Rd. A car was waiting to turn right and an SUV behind it decided to swerve around without any signal. I nearly went into the side of the car. Please be aware of impatient drivers.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Autos blinken oft nicht wenn sie hier in den Hermesweg rechts abbiegen. Ich hatte bereits einen Zusammensto, sowie einen beinahe Unfall.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was dropping my daughter off at school. Car did not yield the right away as I was stop at a four way stop. The car spontaneously accelerated out of turn in front of me forcing me to brake suddenly.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

details: For the fourth time in this spot a driver cut into the bike lane while rounding the corner while I was there. I had to scream at him to avoid the collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle

details: Stopped, signalled left, had right-of-way, car accelerated while I was already in intersection and struck me

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Black BMW 135 overtook on left, then made a sudden and immediate right-turn onto Phillip, crossing my lane. I braked, skidded, and hit back of vehicle

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was heading east and a BMW driver to on Cook was about to roll though the stop sign as I was approaching. I slammed on the brakes just before I crossed his path. As I did, he finally looked right (he never looked right before) and continued on his merry way.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was headed north on Heather St through green light. Driver ahead of me went to turn right onto 12th, as cars are not allowed straight through intersection, but then illegally turned around barricade to go straight on Heather, and nearly collided with the side/ rear of me and my bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Travelling north on shelbourne  when driver passed within inches of my handlebars.  No bike facilities here make this a common issue and this isn't the first time it's happened.  Vehicles rushed and narrow driving lanes.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver turning left at intersection cut in front of me as I was proceeding through the intersection.  Would have hit me had I not slammed on my breaks. No bike lane paint through the intersection though might not have helped with this driver.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Right-hook by a white pickup truck that passed me just prior to turning. Had to brake hard and veer right to avoid hitting the truck.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was biking to Fujiya and this idiotic driver decided to overtake me without giving me some space (1 metre) so it passed right next to me. I swear there are more impatient drivers these days.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cars were backed up (not moving) but the bike lane was clear so I was moving well heading west. A truck heading east decided to turn left through an opening in the line of cars. Apparently the driver didn't see me in the bike lane and I had to swerve to avoid getting taken out. Almost smooshed!

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A driver was busy texting on her phone, not paying attention, and rolled into the bike lane. I had to scream at her and bang on her car to get her attention.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: From Arsenal eastbound bike lane I attempted to move out of bike lane to make left turn onto Grand. As I attempted to do that a shuttle nearly hit me while traveling close to 30 mph. I took evasive action and avoided collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Headed straight across View on Cook. Truck crossing Cook eastbound, headed through gap in cars in left lane, saw me and accelerated as I was abeam of his bumper. Had to pedal quickly to avoid getting hit.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: While riding in the bike lane approaching the intersection of College and Gordon a car without signaling moved across the bike lane from the through lane to the right turn lane nearly clipping my front tire. Had to slam on my breaks to avoid.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Person driving a motor vehicle failed to yield [cyclists have ROW in the cycle track] turned left/east onto 14 Ave. SW from 5 St. SW across my path, requiring me to make a panic stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was travelling SE on the Dunsmuir separated bike lane. An SUV travelling NW was making a right-hand turn and failed to stop for both me and the cyclist in front of me. The cyclist in front of me did fall as a result of dodging, but there was no impact with the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading south through the intersection at 96th Ave and 199A street.  Used rear view mirror to check vehicles approaching to see if they were turning right (no signals).  I headed through the intersection and one of the vehicles sped up and turned right directly in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car ran red light while pedestrians were crossing and I was merging onto road on bike. Caught at next light, driver complained that people were coming onto street out of nowhere and he had to swerve.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Southland Bus passed person on a bike too close, nearly clipping them. Here's a video of the near-miss: https://vine.co/v/eIzuuQVw06j

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was cycling along Lynn Valley road at a moderate rate of speed, slightly slower than traffic.  A vehicle veered into me as we approached a red light.  I had to hop onto the sidewalk to avoid the vehicle.  When I went to confront the driver, I saw they had their head down using their phone.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I almost hit by a car as it passed at an aggressively fast speed, and passed closely to scare me.  I biked another couple of blocks, caught the driver at a red light, slammed my fist on his hood and yelled at him.  He yelled back and threatened to kill me, then drove off.  What a pussy!

i_type: Fall
details:
Very frosty road conditions. I stopped on Kitma at Tyee behind the BMW at the stop sign. Started across road and a slightly turn on to the bike lane. 
I turned the handle bar, but the bike didn't turn; I went down. Glad I stopped and wasn't going fast.
Watch for Frosty road conditions.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Distracted Chinese lady driver turning right onto the bike Lane without signaling nor checking her mirrors.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding in the right  northbound lane of Shelbourne, approaching a car stopped in the left northbound lane waiting to turn left onto Myrtle. Another car changed lanes quickly to go around stopped car but didn't shouldercheck so didn't see me. Had to brake and swerve to avoid being run off the road.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Fahrzeug mit stark berhhter Geschwindigkeit ignorierte markierte und verordnete Radberfahrt. Nur durch Sprung samt Rad nach vorne verhinderte Zusammensto.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Fall
details: Riding towards Vic on Goose.  Black Icey Patch - nearly lost control and had to drive into the ditch.  There is often ice in this section - be careful.  Ice forms before the maintenance crews come to work, so they salt the trail after commuters have already passed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in B position and signalling a left turn. An oncoming car and a pedestrian crossing Humboldt had priority, so I waited for them, then turned. A car behind me was trying to pass me in the oncoming lane , and we nearly collided. It's too wide there to take the lane effectively.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
This is a four-way stop. I approach the intersection, stopped, observed the car approaching from the North, and then continued into the intersection.

The motorist slowed on approach, then accelerated into the intersection without stopping, nearly hitting me side-on.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car traveling from off ramp from HWY 17 turning right (West) onto McKenzie did not yield right of way to cyclist in the bike lane who was traveling west. Driver cut off cyclist. Collision was avoided only due to hard use of brakes and swerving. This sort of situation occurs at this location often.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Ich fuhr auf dem Radweg an einer Schlange auf Grn wartender Kfz vorbei. Durch die Schlange hindurch bog von der Gegenfahrbahn ein Kfz in die Tankstellenausfahrt hinein ab. Durch meinen Schrei stoppte das Kfz - aber erst auf dem Radweg.  Kontaktpunkt auf Hhe des Vorderreifens. Sturz auf Motorhaube.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle

Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: car operator (traveling north) failed to stop at the stop sign (with red light in the opposite direction to make a left turn (west) across my path.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: 86 year old lady driving a small car passed me and mad a left in front of me I hit her at 38 klm hr with out braking

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
