details: A driver passed me partially in the right hand lane while I was riding in the centre of that lane.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading north on the Ontario bikeway at 33rd. Light turned green for cycling traffic across 33rd. Drive failed to stop red light. Slowed in the middle of intersection and passing behind me through the remainder of the intersection.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Dark sandy brown colour sierra/silverado pickup passed within inches at 70+km/h, didn't move over at all despite no other traffic in sight.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I witnessed a man on a bike get hit by a car because his  bike got stuck in the trolley tracks by the History Museum at Lindell and Debaliver in Saint Louis, MO. His leg was injured and he was taken to the hospital.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was heading straight in the right hand lane passed a line of stopped cars waiting to turn left at the intersection.  I heard a vehicle coming up behind me fast and swerved over to the curb just as a vehicle swerved into my lane just before the line of cars in the other lane. Had I not moved over when I did, the vehicle would have hit me.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver attempted to overtake and  turned in too close, hitting me with side of car. Lost balance and  fell .

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Truck that was stopped at Stop sign where Duppelin Road crosses Galloping Goose trail pulled out in front of oncoming bikes.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Mini van stopped on a diagonal in the bike lane and handicapped parking. The van had it's hazard lights on so the bike ahead of me and myself safely merged into the driving lane to pass. The van then tried to merge into both of us without looking. I used my air horn to announce our presence.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car approaching from behind overtook me at roundabout and turned left. Had to brake as not enough room for both bike and a car in lane

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going 40-45 km/he downhill approaching the intersection.  I did not have a stop sign Feltham.   Vehicle came out from Tyndall (past the stop sign) and stopped directly in front of me.  Hit the brakes and slammed into the drivers door.  Dented the door and broke my bike.  I walked away with minor bruising and a sore neck. The

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Stopped behind a truck at the stop sign on Humboldt Street when I was rear ended by a car. Driver was "distracted."

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver exiting the municipal yard did a rolling stop then cut across the bike track without yielding and cutting off cyclists travelling northbound.

i_type: Fall
Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Another cyclist was riding East against traffic in my bike lane. I did not see him until the last minute because he had no lights. I swerved a bit, likely past my painted stripe, to ensure we did not collide.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cut off by driver making a right turn onto gordon

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle pulled out into street right in front of me. I had to slam on my breaks and veer to avoid collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A vehicle travelling west on Pender nearly collided with me as I was going south on Boundary Rd.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver coming the other way turned left onto Fleming right in front of me. Clearly bike-blind.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding west, approaching the intersection. Campbell Avenue has stop signs. The driver of a large delivery truck was approaching Union Street. Looking at smart phone, drove straight through the stop sign at high speed without slowing. He glanced up going through intersection but not to the sides.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car turned right into the parking lot and t-boned a cyclist traveling in the bike lane.  The bike lane transitions from a seperated trail to a bike lane at this location and is a location that I have always felt uneasy travelling through.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The biker in front of me was t-boned by a car turning right into a parking lot.  The separated multi-use trail transitions to a bike lane at this location.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bus and many cars filled middle lane to turn in to how end road, obstructed view of oncoming traffic, bus couldn't turn due to the small width of the road, waved me out and was struck by a car at 60 side on.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle passed me with little margin, perhaps 50 cm. This was an aggressive action by a motorist for no known reason. Perhaps felt I should be closer to parked cars? He gave me the finger out his window after he passed me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Another extremely close pass on this hazardous section of road.  Seems drivers here are often in a hurry to  get on to Route 15.  There is very little room for error here -but drivers can often be seen using smartphones..  Change needed. Cyclists, at least, should be encouraged to take lane here.

i_type: Fall
details: Pothole, long and narrow, caused by top layer of bitumen breaking away from old layer. Was near impossible to see in the dark.  This road has multiple such potholes opening up due to the heavy traffic associated with the new construction at the North end of Hill Road.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Rechts abbiegendes Auto hat Radfahrer in gleicher Richtung bersehen

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was heading west on George Fox Trail and a large pickup truck was heading from Towers trail towards Bow Meadows drive (north). The roads meet at a sharp angle so I assume I was in the driver's blind spot when he decided that the intersection was clear. He noticed just in time to not hit me

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A  car stopped in the middle of the road with hazard light on. I slowed down and stopped behind him, but it looked like he was not going to move. I decided to pass him on the left, since there were no cars coming the other way. As I was passing him, he quickly made a U-Turn and hit me from the side.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Very close pass at high speed

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Hit from the side by cyclist I was overtaking. Other cyclist also swung out to overtake without checking path was clear.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Parked car started driving and turned left without blini g or shoulder check, I was just biking by and got almost hit by that unexpected swerve

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Busy with school drop off, car parked suddenly swerved left without blinking

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I've had a couple near misses here, and all of them have been from cars crossing the bike path without looking for bikers.  The latest time I slammed on my brakes as to not run into the side of the car crossing the bike lane.  Driver honked and yelled at me even though he had a stop sign.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turning right almost gave me the "right hook" while not signalling a turn into Angelino's.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Often when I pass this intersection, cars coming S on 14 St N do not see me before they pass their yield sign, causing them to enter the intersection while I am in it with right of way.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I stopped at the four way stop, heading S on Bute. I started riding S through the intersection. The next car heading E began to accelerate through the intersection and directly towards me, as I was now almost in the centre of the intersection he almost hit me. I screamed and he stopped in time.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver tried to pass me on bridge which is clearly marked "no passing"

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver of silver minivan plate#px626b pulled out of parking row right into my path and never saw me. Lights and Hivis. Stopped hard right beside driver door. Banged on window to alert driver she almost hit me. Not paying any attention.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was going straight along heather across 12th with a green light. The driver of an oncoming car turned left across my path, and I had to brake hard to avoid. The driver did not signal the turn, but he flashed his high beams at me as he was turning.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Unnamed 29 year old male hit by car. Hospitalized with serious but non-threatening injuries. Outcome unclear.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car was riding beside me. We were both heading W on Riverside and the vehicle turned N on to Warncliff without signaling or shoulder checking cutting me off. I slammed on the breaks missing the car by centimetres.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car sped past and turned to the right with little clearance. I had to brake to avoid the car.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was heading eastbound on the south side of stony plain road (it's a wider sidewalk) we were making our way to the 127 street bike lanes so we were only going to be on the sidewalk for a few blocks. When crossing 131 street, a westbound driver was turning left and hit me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: bike/bus lane leads here and ends in intersection becoming a merging lane for Prince of Wales traffic then merges into the driving lane. On this portion of infrastructure shortly after merging safely, a car deliberately passed within  2 inches of myself at side of lane. No shoulder on this road.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Westbound cycling from intersection; took the lane from the intersection past parked cars on the shoulder. Car driver that was behind me at the intersection drove me off the road @ 35km/hr to get past. Narrowly avoided being intentionally hit by her car.  Mixed bike & car lane is not functional/safe

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was biking to the left of a moving car, in between the car &  some diagonal parked cars. The car slowed, and without putting on its turn signal, started to turn right into a parking spot. I hit the brakes & was able to get behind the car & swerve to the left, around the car, to avoid getting hit.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: My 6yo, riding on the sidewalk, was narrowly missed as he entered the crosswalk by a car turning right at speed. He would have been hit except a pedestrian grabbed him and physically pulled him back.

i_type: Fall
details: Exited bike lane to avoid puddle, fell when I tried to get back into the bike lane as the lane in concrete and raised from the road next to it

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This intersection is a nightmare.  No bike lane and cars only seem to notice cars.  A pickup truck was stopped for a red light, I was travelling through the green light, heading straight on Tecumseh.  The truck decided to turn right on to Tecumseh and directly into my path.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: A car drove through the intersection (across The Goose) without stopping or looking for bike/pedestrians.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Northbound on Main, just crossed 12th when a van sped up on my left side, swerved in front of me, and slammed on their brakes to take a quick right turn into the gas station parking lot (rather than wait behind me). I slammed on my brakes, skidded, my front wheel bumped the side/back of the van.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Orbit bus driver drove up beside me then cut into bike lane to pick up pedestrian while i was beside him. He saw me in his mirror. I was mid-way along the bus and could not stop or speed up to avoid. luckily curb is rounded so i hopped onto sidwalk, then almost hit the pedestrian waiting for bus.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Truck turned right, in front, of me as I crossed the intersection and I struck the side just into the drivers door.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Large white truck turned right in front of me, as I travelled through the intersection in a straight line with the right of way. I struck the behind the wheel hub/into the drivers door. Fortunate that truck was moving slowly, having just stopped at a stop sign. Bike was moderately damaged.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was progressing through a green light. Driver didn't look and turned left into me. I was in a dedicated, separated bike lane progressing through an intersection with the right of way. Driver didn't look, and/or didn't see me though I was in a well-lit area and had proper lights on my bike.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Fall
details: Pedestrian standing at the bus stop between Burrard St and the bike lane suddenly stepped into the bike lane without looking.  I was 3 m away and had to swerve to avoid her, skidding and falling off my bike in the process.  It's a tight area with little space between the bus stop and bike lane.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Two vehicles passed within inches of my bicycle, one after the other.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was taking the lane and a motorcycle came up from behind and passed within 1 m

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was in the roundabout intersection when a car approaching the intersection did not look and was not going to give way.  He had to put on his breaks to avoid hitting myself and my daughter who was on the back of the bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Taxi driver pulled close behind me then floored it past me, just missing me. I was brightly lit. It's impossible that it wasn't deliberate. Blue Bird Cabs.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was waiting for pedestrian lights, already turned red for traffic and was about to cross where a car coming from Furumelur that only looked at on comming traffic and never looked to check the traffic lights witch just truned red and green for pedestrians.  Lights too close to intersection...

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The driver of the car very obviously did not check to see if there were any approaching cyclists or pedestrians on the Galloping Goose aka the most well-known bike highway on Vancouver Island. The car took off and I t-boned the driver-side door, surprising the driver. My bike and I were unharmed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding South on 4th, had a car pull in front of me that was crossing from Tags to the Yukon Inn. Had to emergency brake to avoid getting hit. It was during daylight hours, and there were no visual barriers.

i_type: Fall
details: A car stopped completely blocking the bike lane. I crashed avoiding a collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading east on Pandora protected bike lane, truck starts to turn across the lane at Amelia. Driver doesn't appear to be stopping, so I slam on my brakes and skid on the wet green paint. They stop and I proceed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Crossing the bridge a car passed me, almost hit the car coming the other direction and then to avoid hitting the oncoming car almost knocked me into the creek.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Just before noon, I was headed downhill, (south) at over 25mph while taking up the full vehicle lane given the painted "sharrows" on the road.  A driver who was parked against the curb in a loading zone proceeded to pull out directly in front of me to make a u-turn across all lanes of traffic.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The cyclist on the bike waiting at the head of the lights queue slipped and fell into the opposite carriageway almost being run over.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Extremely close pass by inattentive, possibly intoxicated driver.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle (SUV) passed on left, then immediately began to turn right across my path into a business driveway. Braked as hard as possible with both brakes and weight shifted back. Came within 2 feet of hitting the SUV.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bus overtook at 90 kph so close that I could have reached out and touched it. Visibility was perfect, road was dry and moderate traffic.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This section of the Dollarton Highway has an inviting but dangerous multi-use path running alongside the roadway which is essentially an extra wide sidewalk. On a number of occasions, I've come very close to being hit by vehicles turning right (across the path) into businesses or other streets.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle honked at me, when I stopped to see what the problem was, they charged at me with their vehicle, struck me at an angle, then drove away.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turned left in front of cyclist. Cyclist off work for 8 months and still in daily pain 18 months later

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
I was going straight across 51st Avenue. Motorist was westbound on Paradise Lane, preparing to turn south onto 51st Ave. 

Traffic cleared, I thought she saw my big neon-pink self and started across the intersection. Driver started to turn but saw me and slowed to let me pass.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading south on 20th street. Car passes and brakes to turn right. Nearly collide with rear of vehicle

i_type: Fall
details: Witnesses older gentlemen riding bike try and turn right to follow tracks SE. He crashed as he turned as he was not crossing at a steep enough angle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Trike riders refusing to follow rules and stopping at stop sign like every other vehicle. Felt he was above reproach and does not followe the rules of the road. Lucky the other vehicle was paying attention to this idiot on a bike. Where is a cop when you need one

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver turns left across the bike lane without looking. I have to come to a stop to avoid running into the vehicle's side

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A 1980s-style beige van, licence number 324WAJ, attempted to turn into the mall parking lot through the bike lane, and myself, without shoulder checking. Yelling on my part alerted the driver seconds before they would have struck me and my bike trailer.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver of eastbound truck with red light turning right onto SE Foster Rd off of SE Holgate Blvd crashed into cyclist crossing Holgate in the crosswalk.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was waiting to cross a road junction when a van bumped into me. The van was travelling slowly. I went to see the driver and he apologised. I wasn't injured and my bike doesn't seem to be damaged.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was biking up Smithe in a SHARED car/bike lane (there is a clear sign indicating this) and biking up the right-most lane when a minivan squeezed itself past me on the left, missing me by only an inch or so. He sped by me at high speed even though this was a construction zone.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: car turns right accross lane without looking

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Minivan plate jy9127 passed within inches.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was headed south in the east sidewalk when a car making a right turn to head north began to pull out as I rode in the crosswalk. They did not say me crossing and ran into me. The car quickly stopped and I was not injured.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Witnessed the incident the bicyclist refused care

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: After the crosswalk signaled me to go I started going North, however a vehicle was focused on looking left towards oncoming traffic, and tried to make a right turn before oncoming traffic. I was crossing with a group of pedestrians and was the first to get hit, the driver immediately stopped.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Biking through road/parking lot when a car pulled out suddenly. Hit the front-left. Would've been majorly injured however my bike bag bore the full force of the impact. Nasty scrape on my elbow and several bruises, but nothing else.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was walking in the crosswalk and a taxi was waiting at the stop sign. A cyclist headed left of the taxi to turn left into a marked bike lane. Taxi turned left as I was clearing the crosswalk and hit cyclist at an angle. Cyclist did not seek medical attention at the time of the crash.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was traveling west.  A vehicle traveling east turned left into me. We both slammed on our brakes, I was inches from colliding with the front pasenger door of the vehicle.  The driver was nice enough to say  at least I didnt hit you.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver in a large truck was turning left off of 6th onto S Roosevelt. I could see him looking left and right before turning but could tell he hadn't noticed me. I tried waving my arm at him but even that didn't work. I had to swerve to avoid getting hit as he turned.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turning right didn't signal or acknowledge me (I was going straight across 7th Ave)

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Car was stopped at a pedestrian crossing. After the walker had crossed the street, the passenger opened her door to get out. I swerved to miss her and yelled to "check her f*#%ing mirror". The driver then chased me and chewed me out for "cussing at a lady" and told me next time, to deal with him.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going around roundabout, I was already on the roundabout and a car came from the North and purposely did not stop, clipped my front wheel and almost my leg. The driver continued around the roundabout and did not stop.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cyclist was stopped at the intersection and had the green light for cyclists.  Delivery truck ran the red light turning left off Mackenzie onto Borden in front of Reynolds. Cyclists anticipated the delivery truck not stopping and there was no incident

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver at two way stop came to a full stop and then accelerated directly in front of me and cut me off.  I was unable to avoid colliding with the side of the car.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A white Calgary Board of Education (CBE) truck with # 67 on it pulled into my lane as it was passing me got as close as possible to me without running me over, then got back into the left lane and continued in the left lane until I lost sight of it.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Van passed me with no room and forced me into the curb.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This is the second time this has happened to me in this corner! I was travelling straight when a vehicle attempting to turn right into the mall parking lot turned directly throughy painted bike lane, almost striking me. The driver appeared oblivious to the presence of a bike lane.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver intentionally drove close to me with engine revving to intimidate me. I let the driver know my displeasure through a hand signal and the driver saw this in rear view mirror. The driver then stopped to complain about hand signal and demanded apology and said I was lucky he was on parole.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cars pulling out of Tempe Marketplace to turn left to head south on McClintock didn't look for me, my wife, & son on bikes trying to cross the crosswalk into the mall. This is a common access point for bicyclists coming from the Tempe Town Lake trail, & I know my wife has had a similar scare before.

i_type: Fall
details: I witnessed this incident. A bicyclist coming down the hill lost control due to mechanical malfunction (the stem quill came out of the steerer tube!), hit the curb, and went flying. He rolled out of it on the grass and was unhurt. The bike looked sketchy and the rider had a full-face helmet.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car heading East bound, turning left (North). I was biking West bound and it hit me while turning left in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver SB turning right did not look for oncoming bike traffic, nearly turned right over top of me (would have, if I hadn't noticed she wasn't watching). Slammed on brakes and avoided collision.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Doored on Esplanade north side west of Lonsdale.. I hit the interior centre of the door after slamming my brakes. The diver dusted off marks on his door interior and quickly shut his door. No concern for me, no are you ok, not even a sorry.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turned right in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I'd ridden two-thirds of the way through the roundabout when a car failed to give way and continued on into the roundabout, directly into my path. I thought it was going to hit me and am still not quite sure why it didn't - I think I must have swerved but was fairly shaken so am not sure.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The change of the red light at the crossing to a flashing mode creates confusion among the motorists and is a hazard to bicyclists.   A bicyclist who entered the crosswalk on the west side was nearly hit as a vehicle proceeded through the crosswalk.

i_type: Fall
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
I was cycling on a cycle/walk path towards a zebra crossing. Car arrives from left. We collite nose of car to nose of bike.
Frame and fork and rim of bike destroyed. 
Visibility at corner obstructed by 3 meter high wall.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car pulled out blindly from one of the parking lots, directly in front of me, whilst another car followed closely behind.  Happened in close proximity to a raised pedestrian crossing giving no extra space for the following car to swerve around me in case of emergency.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Extremely close pass

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: In the construction zone, I was passed closely enough that I could touch the car. Due to construction, part of the motor vehicle lane is closed, and cars merge with the bike lane.  This zone is a few tens of metres long.  I was about halfway through the zone when the driver squeezed me out.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: After turning right on to Rocky Point Rd from Kangaroo Road a Thriftys Food delivery truck backing up the wrong way down the road almost ran into a group of riders.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: On the west side of 16th Street I was passing through a pavement cut toward the park heading home from work. A car coming out of the flower shops was looking at the other vehicles north of the position, but did not look south on the sidewalk as I passed and pulled out when I was in front of them.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: 2 way stop to my right & left. I was about to travel up a hill with the right of way (because I had no stop signs).Car driver briefly stopped at the stop sign looked at me as I was travelling through the intersection & he proceeded to slowly drive toward me,forcing me to go around him.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Was heading east on Scott using vehicle lane as I was intending to turn left onto Bayswater at next light, buses back to back in bus lane.

Car turning left onto Scott  pulled out between two buses with very poor sight lines and collided with me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Buddy driving a black minivan slowly pulled out in front of me. I had to brake and wait for him to clear the bike lane. Random witness yelled at the driver.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Large dodge pickup passed at speed within inches.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Making left turn onto minor arterial was surprised by oncoming car moving very fast.  Stranded in Two way left turn lane (TWLTL) while rush hour traffic went by both directions.  Suddenly felt threat and looked up to see oncoming truck using center lane TWLTL as acceleration lane

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver in a small SUV crossed the bike lane to turn right. She stopped and apologized and said she didn't see me, but she had checked over her shoulder(?). She did not signal.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A  older white Pickup moving North (same direction as I was moving) passed me as close as possible without hitting me at a high rate of speed.  This was an intentional action.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was headed to work in low-light conditions.  I approached a cross street (they have a stop sign).  As I proceeded, a truck stopped at the stop sign, then proceeded and didn't see me until I had to stop and they were crossing my path directly in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Beinnahe-Unfall!
Als ich bergauf fuhr auf dem entsprechend beidseitig ausgeschilderten, sehr schmalen (!) Radweg ( blaues Radschild auf dem Fu/Radweg!),
und mir dann einer den Berg hinunter entgegenfuhr....
es war echt eng!

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding North on Government St, going through the intersection of Government and Discovery streets.  A vehicle proceeding South on Government St made a left turn onto Discovery.  I tried to avoid the accident however there there wasn't enough time or distance

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I rode along the sharrows. Commissionaires bylaw enforcement drove very close behind, honked, passed close, and pulled in causing me to take evasive action to not get hit. Stopped and gave abuse yelling at me to move over and to share the road.  License plate CV2 77A, marked as Unit 11-001.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Right huge by a huge pickup. Signaled about 1 second before starting her turn into a driveway. Video here: https://youtu.be/VUahpNlrx8Q

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cyclist had to veer behind parked car to avoid being run over by white van speeding through South to North (Heatley ave, to Union st to Princess ave) BC EF 5728.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle  heading East ran the red light.  Didn't stop even after grazing my front tire and me hitting their driver side view mirror.  This is the second time a driver has run this light at this intersection so I now cycle via the Georgia viaduct.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was on the Martin Goodman trail and had the right of way. I was t-boned by an uber making a hasty left off the lakeshore into Ontario place.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Split at MGT/Lakeshore to continue onto pathway beside Don Roadway to get to Villiers. Driver turning left from DVP off ramp watched me cross westbound lanes, slowed their left, then stopped immediately in front of me to not let me proceed through the intersection and onto the Don Roadway path

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Split at MGT/Lakeshore to continue onto pathway beside Don Roadway to get to Villiers. Driver turning left from DVP ramp watched me cross westbound lanes on green, slowed their left, then stopped immediately in front of me to not let me proceed through the intersection and onto the Don Roadway path

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car ran a stop sign eastbound at four-way stop. Side-swiped me and destroyed bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding east on Adelaide at Church. I did a shoulder check approaching the intersection to look for turning vehicles & caught a truck behind me trying to turn right across all 3 lanes from the far lane to where I was. I sped up & he barely missed rear-ending me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: SUV pulling into 761/763 Bay St pickup loop did not check blind spot and pulled into bike lane.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Uber pulled over in front of me. Stopped quickly and back right passenger door swung open hitting my hands and sending me over door/handle bars. Uber passenger left without checking if I was OK.  I had scrapes and bruises.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car was stopped at a red light, heading south, but slightly in the multi-use path trying to make a right turn. Just before I was about to enter the intersection, heading east, on a green light, the car pulled ahead to block the entire path. I had to brake hard to avoid the collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver didn't yield at a round about

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car driving West was speeding trying  to make the green light and passed me very close at high speed as I was crossing elbow drive at the light.

i_type: Fall
details: car turning right through red light, pulled in front of me. I swerved tgo avoid, and hit kerb throwing me off bike

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A FedEx truck came close to sideswiping me.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was turning left around a circular median, signalled but collided with a cyclist who had gone through the intersection on the wrong side of the median

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: riding down the street when car in front suddenly stopped to avoid a collision with a car turning into a driveway. I rear-ended the car at around 40 kph . I dented the roof of the car with my head and spent the night in the hospital for concussion I was in a dark room for  9 days with no stimulation

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Left hook accident when driver pulled across PBL to get to a space in a parking lot.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Observed another cyclist get 'doored' on the separated bike lane by passenger exiting passenger door of car.  Bike lane here is separated from traffic by parked cars.  Cyclist was slowing for the light and didn't look to have any major injuries.  They were stunned then kept cycling.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I had just cleared the intersection and was heading straight towards the raised Cook street bike lane. A large pickup zoomed to overtake me, didn't quite succeed but turned into me anyway to get into the gas station on the corner.  Fortunately he hit the brakes just before mowing me down.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was cycling in a predictable straight line outside of the door zone when an SUV pulled out in front of me from being parked. I braked and yelled but didnt get the licence, because a bus had nearly killed me seconds before. I was not impressed with police response.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was the pedestrian hit by a cyclist at full speed, in a cross walk, with cars already stopped for me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A driver was stopped at the stop sign, was looking the opposite direction of me, and didnt look my direction before entering the intersection. I was able to brake and luckily so were the 2+ other bikers behind me. The driver didnt see us or stop and continued through the intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Stopped at a red light in a cycle track with no bollards, curb or other separation, a driver illegally passed me within inches between me and a car stopped in the next lane to turn right on red without stopping

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: At a red  w/ car waiting to turn left next to me. I was abt 1.5 metres from the curb/taking the lane.A black car roared up behind me & hit the brakes, stopping so short that bumper was 1mm from my rear fender.Driver wasn't signaling &wouldn't make eye contact. At green, pulled v close to 2turn right

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A red Honda CRV travelling south on Blanchard (AE6 12G) half in the bike lane, returned to their lane momentarily before turning into the Mall parkong lot without signalling or checking for cyclists in the bike lane. I held back already suspicious of the driver given their encroachment into the bike

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding in the lane, run off the road by a speeding suv which did not slow down, did not move around me. One oncoming car with no other traffic on a quiet country road. Broad daylight. Fortunately on this section of the road there was just enough shoulder for me to get out of the way.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Close pass at high speed

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver waiting in right-hand turn lane quickly pulled over solid white line towards Johnson St. lane without checking bike lane directly to their left.  Close behind it, I (on bike) hit the brakes. Driver stopped with front of car diagonally across bike lane. I came to a stop at the driver's window.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: HGV Bella Bro close passed on uphill climb past WSC Water Service

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I came off of Burnside Rd on a path connecting to the Goose. I looked left, then right, and then proceeded to move forward across the Goose, turning south toward Victoria. A cyclist was travelling at high speed north. We collided. Vegetation appears to have obstructed our views.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding North on Main st in far right lane beside the parked cars, on the (faded) sharrows. Car in lane left to me suddenly pulls into my lane beside curb, forcing me into parked cars. Luckily riding slow and able to break. If driver shoulder checked/ checked mirrors he would have seen me

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Stupid driver passed on a blind corner and cut across in front. Police noted this on his license for further prosecution if repeated.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Sedan driving about 20km/h did not stop at sign crossing eastbound. We both braked before impact: impact front of vehicle to side of my front tire. Maybe 1 foot or 3km/h of impact. Low velocity at impact.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding eastbound on the north side of the sidewalk when a car came out of a driveway at a fast speed, without slowing down at the sidewalk. I braked quickly and the driver apologized with his hand. Frustrating.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This location is notoriously bad. The driver ignored a stop sign and almost ran into me as i was going straight. I locked up my brakes coming to a stop. Drivers at this intersection are constantly being rash and careless, despite bikes having the right-of-way going up the one-way section on Triumph.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Right hooked by vehicle at a cross street. The vehicle did not have a turn signal on (or turned it on too late) and turned as I was passing it.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver went to turn left across lane from a perpendicular street. There was no room in the lane he was trying to turn into so he stopped directly in front of me. There was not enough distance to come to a stop before crasging into his van.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cyclist killed. See article https://www.kelownacapnews.com/news/kelowna-road-blocked-after-cyclist-is-hit-by-vehicle/

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: HGV cut in on me

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Buddy was turning left and stopped before the cycle tracks. Started driving as I approached. I yelled and he gave the "sorry" wave.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The road is squeezed by a concrete median that only allows for a right turn. The vehicle tried to overtake me but only ended up forcing me into the curb.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I had the green light for bikes to continue on the bike path to head to the Cambie bridge, but a vehicle almost hit me as it was turning a quick right without looking. Luckily I slowed and stopped because I am very careful now at intersections (so many close calls)

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: While riding across the street on a walk light a white SUV turned through the intersection and crosswalk without noticing me at all, when I had the right of way as I was going straight. Waved and yelled and vehicle did not seemingly notice me at all.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Vehicle travelling eastbound on Pretoria.  Turning corner off Queen Elizabeth after turning off of Pretoria Bridge.
Tried to tell person it was one way st and to turn around.  They did not stop but carried on.  No license plate visible.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A right turning vehicle coming from 6th Ave. almost hit me as I was crossing the intersection. I had a green (bicycle) light, but the driver wasn't looking behind/to the right for my approach (it's a bi-directional cycle crossing).

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Cars pulling out of the alley heading South have a hard time seeing traffic in the bike lane, because of how the bike lane angles in toward the curb. Car was not looking and drove into the lane right as I was riding by in the lane. Slammed on my brakes and didn't get hit by the car.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car turning left through the bike lane at intersection. Failed to obey yield to cyclists on the bike lane and would have hit me had I not stopped to yield right of way.

i_type: Fall
details: Going about 15k/h, slowly approached the turn to turn south onto path that leads to the 7th st cycle track, and my tire slid from under me because of slightly drizzly conditions and the slick surface of the freshly painted pathway.landed on my left side and ended up with black bruises and rug burn

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Southbound driver drove through stop sign without looking right in front of my path. I had to stop suddenly to avoid hitting him.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Turning left (right of way) from Dowler to Wark St.


Left turn has right of way and straight through has stop sign that is easy to miss.  Vehicles frequently miss the stop sign.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding my bike and a large buck (deer) charged me head in.  I swerved to miss him and he carried on down the road.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding north on Metropolitan in right lane; a driver passed me very very closely going very fast. I stopped out of fear. Road was very clear at that time; it seemed like a punishment pass.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I pressed the crossing light on the Goose at.Wale Road. A bicyclist from the other direction started across, and a car on his side of the road sped up instead of slowing down and hit him.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car attempted to pull out of Mayfair parking lot to merge into slow traffic  lane while I was moving quickly in the  empty bike lane. The driver did not look for bikes and started to pull into traffic, blocking the bike lane. I had to slam on my brakes to avoid colliding with the front of her car.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding up the hill on Heather across the intersection at Broadway. There was lots going on in the intersection (cars turning, pedestrians crossing), so I proceeded carefully. A black dodge pickup turning left gunned the engine, spun the tires, and cut super close behind me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A bus overtook me after the intersection and ran me into the gutter. I had to stop because the bus was scrapping up against my handlebars. The bus clearly saw me in the intersection at Blanshard and Yates and decided to overtake me. Bus #9453.

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver attempted to make prohibited right turn across dedicated bike lane. Driver not aware of bikes, bike lane or vehicle straight ahead only signs.  Managed to brake in time to avoid collision with side of vehicle and stop driver by yelling. Was wearing hi-viz jacket + helmet.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Witnessed a vehicle come out of alleyway between 106 and 107 St. and nearly hit an eastbound cyclist in the bike lane. Cyclist swerved to avoid and motorist slammed on brakes after traveling most of the way through the bike lane

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: As I came over he Murray Street overpass and turning left onto Murray Street ( had the right of way), a car on the right was stopped at his stop sign, then proceeded straight, as I was turning left. I had to swerve and hit the brakes so that I did not hit the driver's side of his vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: traffic circle at the intersection, and I was well into the circle heading straight through. car coming on my right was coming fast while I was halfway through already. they finally slammed on the brakes and did not hit me, but it did shake me up

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
On the south side of Patterson station there is a cycle track through the bus area, and pedestrians often walk along the separated and signed cycle track to short-cut to their bus. 
This happened again today - I rang my bell and asked them please not to walk in the designated bike area.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Biking north on the Arbutus Greenway, crossed 41st ave at the pedestrian crossing, then there is a sharp right hand turn to get back onto the greenway. The overgrown blackberry along the greenway, and of the sharpness of the turn itself makes this is a very blind corner. Had a collision with cyclist

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding through roundabout when a van came from the north. I don't think the driver saw me as he didn't slow down and entered the roundabout. I slowed quickly realizing the driver wasnt stopping, then the driver saw me and came to a stop. No impact, but I had to lean on the van to not fall over

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Blind corner from Rupert to westbound CVG. Nearly collided with a ped as I was turning right. She was walking on the north side of the path, which was the wrong side for her. Blind corner makes it hard to see what's ahead.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver attempted to simultaneously pass me and take a right turn; only avoided serious injury by thumping their rearview mirror.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Approaching a stop sign (less than 50 yards) I took the center of the lane. A minivan passed me ignoring the double- yellow line and then cut me off to get back in our lane for the stop. This partially blocked the oncoming lane and prevented the vehicle that had right-of-way from proceeding

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Cyclists were headed west bound on CR 750 N when a motorist turning left onto 750 N failed to stop at the end of the driveway for the St Malachy Catholic Church.  
Lead cyclist hit her brakes and swerved to avoid being hit by the motorist, clipping my front wheel, sending me hard to the ground.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Coming down Janes Chapel Road, there was a car parked on the side of the road in the opposing lane, and an approaching car went around the parked car, coming into my lane.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Had an advance green to turn left, and the car tried to turn right on the red, almost hitting me in the process.  Car didn't stop, or even notice me until I started yelling.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle executed a right hand turn into my path when i had the right of way in a green light.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: On the E and N trail crossing Admirals Road eastbound.  The light turned green and I proceeded into the intersection straight ahead. A pickup truck in the left turn lane opposite accelerated into the intersection and struck me on the left hand side   I suffered broken bones and the bike was destroye

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was waiting for the cross signal with other cyclists and pedestrians.  We began to crossvtillicum road when the signal indicated.  As we started ro cross, A car came south on tillicum rd bike lane and began to turn right onto highway 1, westbound. The car used the bike lane on tillicum.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Deer was on water side of trail and waited to cross the pass while three cyclists ahead of me passed.  The deer crossed the path and hid in a small bush but had no place to go due to a retaining wall.  I came up to the spot and the deer was startled and jumped back across the trail in front of me.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Deer appeared out of nowhere from road edge. Must have leapt right out of the trees.  No time to stop and basically t-boned it  it was sideways to me and I plowed into its side body and I was launched right over top of it. Major bruising, road rash, and whiplash. Bike destroyed.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
https://globalnews.ca/news/4555916/surrey-rcmp-investigate-after-cyclist-injured-in-crash/
A cyclist is in hospital after being struck by a vehicle early Tuesday morning in Surrey.
It happened at 72nd Avenue and 126th Street, near the Kwantlen University campus, shortly after 12:30 a.m.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Campus vehicle going wrong way on ring road almost collided with me

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Car on McKenzie turned right (South) on Shelbourne in front of me. I stopped myself from hitting the with my hand . Police stopped me and said that I was at fault because the car had the right of way even though the sign says that bikes have the right of way????

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This is a 4 way intersection - a new driver hit me when she took a left turn while I was going straight. Sunlight might have obstructed her view but this intersection seems to be a hazard. Broke a rib and am still in backpain after 6 weeks.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A driver travelling east on 14th tboned  a cyclist travelling southbound on Cambie street

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I thought the car stopped for me, but it accelerated again to turn right (hadn't seen me despite lights & safety vest).  The Passenger was banging on the window & yelling out and I yelled.  Fortunately I was able to brake enough to avoid the collision. The car stopped right in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding north on Spring Mill Road, turning left onto 79th Street.  I had a green light, used hand signals to turn left.  Midway through the turn, a pickup truck ran the light (from stopped position) to turn N on Spring Mill.  His intent seemed to be so startle me, or hit me.  I kept riding.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Traffic was stopped during rush hour. A pick up truck moved into the bike lane without signalling in order to get around traffic and park at the end of the street. I didnt have enough time to stop and I collided with the truck's mirror, which knocked me off of my bike and I fell onto some bushes.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Pickup truck ran through stop sign at the street crossing the bottom of the dip in the galloping goose trail.  I had slowed as I don't trust drivers there; otherwise would have collided.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A vehicle travelling west down Pandora didn't stop at Boundary (they have a stop sign), and almost hit me as I made a left turn onto Boundary Rd.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle heading north on Moffatt turning east on Granville. Vehicle did NOT even slow until completely blocking the bike lane.  Had to slam on my breaks to avoid collision.  Driver was oblivious to my presence even with my front light AND headlamp on strobe.  This is an EVERY DAY occurrence here.

i_type: Fall
details: Double cycling path near Golden E. bridge in Maple Ridge, when heading to Alouette Lake.  Riding with group of riders, moved slightly to the left to see further ahead.  Metal waist high pole in the middle of the path to divide the two sides.  Swerved and fell.  Two bones broken, detached EPL tendon.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A woman in a silver car passed me dangerously closely. When I pointed this out to her at the light a short while later, she seemed oblivious to the fact that cars need to pass bikes with at least 1m clearance, and do so safely.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was going north on Gore Avenue, as I was going straight I was in the left lane (as a courtesy to anyone turning right), a driver pulled up in the right lane. When the light turned green, that driver pulled ahead and left in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle coming up behibd me honked and nearly sideswipped me as he passed. Licence plate 555 PVV

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car did not yield to cyclist while crossing the crosswalk with green "cyclist" crossing. Car almost hit me and proceeded through the intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Deer bolted across the road in front of me.  Didn't see it until it was in front of me and had to brake (avoided any impact).

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
No traffic, waiting for the light to change.

Bicycle light changed to green and vehicle light was red.
Black Truck sped through the light doing about 70 is my guess.

I didn't notice the truck until he was about one inch to a foot in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
No traffic, waiting for the light to change.

Bicycle light changed to green and vehicle light was red.
Black Truck sped through the light doing about 70 is my guess.

I didn't notice the truck until he was about one inch to a foot in front of me.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Passed on curve by semi, car approached in other direction. Semi came back in lane, forcing me to edge of shoulder.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Nothing but gravel shoulder. Took the lane. Was ran off road, and sworn at. Passing car almost caused head on with oncoming traffic.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Biking home from class, heading westbound on University Dr. and as I was T-boned by a driver pulling out of the parking lot. I thought we made eye contact, and I have lights and stuff on my bike, but I don't blame him for hitting me because the area is really poorly lit.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car passed close on the left and pushed me over to curb towards parked car. When emerged behind the vehicle it stopped suddenly and I hit the rear. This bike route as a lot of vehicles cutting through to avoid congestion on Knight and east - west arteries.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: I was cycling in the "through" lane, heading North on Government St. A car turned left onto Government St, also Northbound, from Fort St forcing me to swerve suddenly into the right turn lane in order to avoid being run over. Then they swore at me and gave me the finger. I was very nearly hit.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Left hook by turning taxi driver who hit gas and recklessly cut me off when light turned green.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going south on College through the Broadway intersection, green light, no cars in the lane beside me. A vehicle in the south-bound left turn lane turned on its right blinkers, and swerved right -- towards me. I braked too hard, flew over the handlebars. The vehicle continued straight.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle opposite direction turned left onto Scott st without ensuring bike lane was clear. Front/side impact. Car and bike totaled by impact, cyclist nearly killed. Ended pro triathlete career. Massive injuries that will never fully heal.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Motorists took a left turn at high speed onto Lansing Street without looking, because there is no barrier that would prevent drivers from doing so. They can take incredibly wide turns at high speeds across the bike path. I crashed avoiding the motorist.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bus parked in bike lane picking up passengers, I signaled into the traffic lane, passed the bus  and returned to the bike lane.  As I did so a SUV behind started honking, then pulled up beside me and move sideways into the bike lane aggressively, trying to push me off the road.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car was following me too closely behind.  I attempted to move off the road and onto the nearby trail, but lost control. Hitting the pavement broke my elbow and cracked my helmet.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Ambulance cut the corner when making a left turn and nearly ran me over. I was waiting in the left turn lane ready to make the left turn once the traffic passed.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: As I was riding my recumbent trike south on the bike lane on Madison Avenue I was hit in the head with a cup full of ice thrown from a moving van. I swerved right crashing into the curb. The teenagers in the van laughed and quickly took off going west on Stop 11. I was not able to get a license #.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding east down Wale Road in a bike lane. Traffic was bumper to bumper but not moving. An SUV pulled out of the traffic line right into the bike lane directly in front of me with no signal. I tried to brake and turn away from the SUV but slammed into the passenger door.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Speading vehicle passed very close nearly striking me from behind while I was attempting to merge into the vehicle lane to make the left turn onto the trail connector for the Galloping Goose.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Was T-boned by a car turning left across my direction of travel

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading through in marked bicycle lane. Vehicle moved into bike lane to access right turn lane. Moved into bike lane in front of me. Had to slam on brakes to avoid direct collision. Still ended up hitting the vehicle, but no injury. BC Vehicle license plate DV9 78M.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicle turning left from wesftield to 56th nearly struck me while I was in the crosswalk and had the right of way.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A car turning left from Colville to go south on Admirals almost hit me as I was riding across the intersection to access the E&N trail on the other side. These crossings for the E&N trail are so confusing & dangerous for cyclists. The car may have had a visibility issue with low angle sun?

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Person on BMX style bike from the right made abrupt move, apparently playing in the street, into bike lane right in front of me. I had right of way.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I had right-of-way through intersection and motorist entered intersection to turn right without stopping. Driver was looking down the street for other cars and failed to look for pedestrians or cyclists in the intersection. Driver slammed on brakes and look genuinely surprised.

i_type: Fall
details: Turning left too fast on the icy road and bike slid out underneath me as I turned.

i_type: Fall
Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car passed bike then turned right into driveway, into the path of bike.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The path in this area is extremely narrow. I had a large truck pass me extremely close leaving me little room to maneuver. The road is in poor condition in this location with a lot of debris, there's almost no options when someone nearly hits you with their mirror.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver was West-Bound turning left onto Stafford Drive South.  Possible there was glare but not likely.  Traffic signal turned amber.  I was behind a large SUV and may not have stood out.  Driver of the Monster Truck hit accelerator as soon as light changed amber and nearly hit me broadside.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The car passed (overtook) me heading east on Pender and then immediately cut across my path to turn right on to Abbott.  I had to break and swerve to avoid running into the side of the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: The car was behind and when it passed me, he tried to pull off the way in aggressive way

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Got hit by a taxi driver. He deeked me out with a false stop at the stop sign and then going for it (thought I had eye contact with him). He said he couldn't see me with the pillars in the car, and took off. I had lights and a reflective jacket. Got a scraped hand and a sore shoulder.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Came across this accident as I was going to work.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details:
A cyclist died in North Vancouver early Sunday afternoon after being struck by a truck. Cyclist was travelling west in a painted bike lane.

https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/cyclist-dies-north-vancouver-1.4995227

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Slow traffic due to bridge issues ahead. Right lane was empty after parking cars and a car from the left lane changed lanes while not checking that I'm already in that lane forcing me to break hard to avoid the collision. She held her phone in hand & was looking at  it while doing the manoeuvrer.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A deer was standing on the left side of the road in my direction of travel. I noticed it and started slowing down when it turned around and started crossing to the right of the road and collided with me as I tried to avoid it. Deer trotted off as I crashed. Several more deer came out after.

i_type: Collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: Heading slowly down N45th St when a car opened its door into me. Right into my handlebars; no possibility to take evasive action. Luckily, I was going slowly, as it had just started slowing. I was send sprawling and landed with the bike on top of me. Driver very apologetic.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding in the roundabout trying to turn on the bike lane going down Bannatyne. A car pulled up behind me and narrowly avoided hitting me.

details: I was heading west on 8th. A minivan ran through the stop sign on Trutch without slowing at all.  I lucky was not hit

details:
Motorist in a red drop top Geo?
with a green bumper sticker turning right from Cook onto quadra turned sharply into the bike lane without signalling and nearly collided with me as I approached the intersection. Driver followed me up the block on quadra yelling through his window then ran a red ligh

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Black  hatchback (128 PCV) turned suddenly into the parking lot with signalling or looking, cutting across the bike lane and narrowly missing me. Driver was subsequently educated, through a short lecture, as to proper road safety and respect for other road users.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was proceeding along Union St with the right of way when a car proceeding North on Campbell Ave that had stopped at the stop sign suddenly started moving forward. It nearly caused me to crash. Fortunately it stopped again in time and I was able to avoid a collision

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was 2 back from the person hit. She was past the roundabout, we were all in the crossing when the car blew through w/o slowing. Driver hit my friend  right front corner of the car so my friend was ahead. She flew through the air, her bike & helmet are done. She'll be fine, but this spot is bad.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: As I was riding in the bike lane a pedestrian ran out from between parked car to get across the street to the skating rink and knocked me off my bike. He wasnt looking out bikes in bike lane and only looking for cars and believed it was clear.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A distracted motorist talking on the phone left the CVS parking lot without stopping.  The vehicle came within a foot of hitting me.  If I had not assumed the vehicle would not stop I would have been struck.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Motorist traveling westbound on Ohio turned right from the middle lane without signaling.  Driver heard me yelling and stopped, narrowly preventing a collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding on right side (no shoulder). Several cars behind. After oncoming cars passed, car behind sped up to roar past, blaring horn (startling me), missing me by inches. Another car behind took down plate # and stopped to give me his name & # in case I wanted to make report (but I don't know where).

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Car didnt stop at stop sign on Triumph heading west and nearly hit cyclist heading north on lakewood.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Travelling in bike line when  car began encroaching into my lane. Turned in front of me before I had time to stop, causing me to hit side of car and fall.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding straight across a cross walk on the sidewalk and a man pulled out of the fulton engineering garage and cut across fast hitting me while I was crossing. I rolled onto his hood and then off of his car, and he destroyed my bike and drove off without saying anything.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A driver passed me and immediately turned right, cutting me off. My front wheel came within 2 inches of the side of the car.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Going north (to get some groceries at Sunrise Market), because of parked cars I was rightfully in the centre of the lane. A driver behind me pulled out quickly on the right (crossing the yellow line with an oncoming car ahead) passed me close and then went back into the lane quickly.

details: I was riding with my 8 year old home from park we were taking lane. insuficent room for cars to pass. Young man tried to pass me. When he ran out of room and tried to merge into us. Then he harrassed me for blocks after. Danger in this part of cook. I have no other otions

details: Close pass by a driver. No oncoming traffic, driver passed me and my husband with only about 12 inches clearance.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was stopped southbound on Ontario at 33rd.  A mother and young child were approaching the intersection heading north.  A large concrete truck turned from 33rd west to Ontario North, cutting across about half of the stop line just as the ~7 year old reached it.  The child's mother was 15m behind.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I witnessed this incident. An e-bike rider (heading straight) was nearly stuck by the driver of a left turning car (left hook). The e-bike rider had the right of way, but was probably moving faster than the car driver expected. The bike rider skidded and wobbled but recovered.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver ran a red light while eastbound cycle track had green signal

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Westbound Pine at 11th, nearly right hooked by Seattle Police SUV, crossed bike lane to turn right on 11th.  I stopped behind him at the light on 12th where there wasn't a bike lane.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A pickup truck going the wrong way on Columbia went through a stop sign and almost hit me broadside. I braked hard to avoid slamming into the truck and flew over the handle bars. I put out my hands to break my fall and broke my scaffoid (wrist) and both radial heads (elbows). Driver charged by ICBC.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Vehicles northbound on Quebec have a slip lane to make a right turn on to Columbia. Most of the the time, there is no vehicular traffic coming from the left and drivers can safely make a right turn on red. There is, however, a bike lane and cyclists coming from the seawall and Science World have the right of way. Drivers often fail to yield, making a right turn on red, as the intersection requires only a slight turn to the right and not a 90 degree change in course.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Riding north on Sutherland Ave.  Stopped at stop sign then proceeded through.  Jeep turning left off 34th Street did not see me and hit me in the rear of the bike knocking me over.  No breaks, lots of bruises.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Hit by a commercial truck turning across my path to rat-run though a gas station so he could avoid the intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: A grey honda civic ran a red light as I was about to engage on the pedestrian path to cross the street.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Bicyclist hit by a car

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: At the four-way stop intersection, I waited for my turn to continue on 45th Ave along with a car (Car A) going the opposite direction. As both Car A and I were crossing the intersection, a second car (Car B) traveling straight on Eliot only waited for Car A and almost ran into me, braking at the last second halfway into the intersection to avoid a collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Most northbound cars on Cambie who turn right at 29th Ave do not stop or yield at the red light, and instead assume they have right of way to turn (red lights don't seem to mean much). A car doing just this almost hit me when I had the green to cross the intersection.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was riding north in a bidirectional cycle track and a northbound vehicle turned left into a parkade across my path.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Heading north-bound and car turning into Whipletree swerved around me in the merge lane

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Travelling north I stopped in the left lane at a red light. A driver in a small delivery van passed me on the right then went in front of me. (I was quick to brake so was okay.)

i_type: Near collision with stationary object or vehicle
details: once cyclist stopped in bike lane to exit onto sidewalk causing cyclist behind to swerve into traffic to avoid collision.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Right turning vehicle nearly hit me as I was cycling east along the cycle path. The crossing is coloured green and signs indicate turning vehicles must yield to cyclists, but it's not enough! Right-turning motorists don't look for cyclists at this crossing. Signal phase separation needed.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: I was driving uphill, and saw a cyclist crest the hill coming down toward me going the opposite direction. Just after, an orange Saturn crested the hill halfway in my lane (over a blind hill) to pass the cyclist. I had to brake to avoid a collision. Saanich, this road is unsafe for all.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: cycling in the bike lane on 4th Avenue approaching a green light. Big truck passed me and immediately turned right through the bike lane. Almost ran into the side of his truck

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Driver didn't want to stop at a yellow light, swerved around me and the car in front of me then sped through the intersection narrowly missing me, the car in front of me and a pedestrian.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: OC Transpo bus instead of waiting to pass me while in the bike lane (not a wide one on Iris St) and car coming in opposing traffic, I was forced to the curb when the bus passed me within a foot.  The bus continued down the street using half the bike lane.  Was reported to OC Transpo but they have not reached out to me despite asking to be contacted.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details:
Cyclist killed in hit and run
https://ottawacitizen.com/news/local-news/cyclist-in-critical-condition-after-downtown-crash
This continues to happen, Menard said of Thursdays mornings collision. Our streets need to be traffic calmed with safe segregated infrastructure, our drivers need to be educated, our officials need to wake up. Protected, safe travel needs to be prioritized.

i_type: Collision with moving object or vehicle
details: This crossing between different sections of the MUP have no markings on the road to warn drivers of pedestrians and cyclists crossing - USE CAUTION.  In trying to cross from the MUP in front HMCS Carleton to the Trillium MUP, even though drivers in one direction yielded, a driver coming from the other direction clipped my front wheel as he went around me in the opposing lane.  This was clearly a case of aggressive driving from the vehicle.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
details: Northbound bike lane narrows at curve in road. Vehicles often cut into bike lane through this curve. On this occasion, a City bus cut so close beside me that I had to stop or else it would have pushed me right into the curb.

i_type: Near collision with moving object or vehicle
